thread.title: Europe Fears Return of Steel Glut as U.S. Imposes Tariffs

author: Zeke Turner
title: Europe Fears Return of Steel Glut as U.S. Imposes Tariffs

organizations.name: europe fears return of steel glut

text:
BERLIN—President Donald Trump’s announcement of punitive steel tariffs may raise U.S. prices short term, but in Europe they could have the opposite effect.
Mr. Trump’s decision last week to impose tariffs—25% on steel imports to the U.S. and 10% for aluminum—could divert a stream of cheap steel now flowing into the U.S. toward the European Union, EU steelmakers fear.
